citations.narrative:
By the west door there is a foot-sized area in center walkway (not where dogs contact) that is missing linoleum and the
wood is rotted and soft. An area like this cannot be maintained clean and if not repaired soon could allow pest entry into
the building. Ensure to repair holes in floors to keep them in good repair to restrict other animals/pest from entering the
building.
***Correct by May 12, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the animal caretaker.
n
